Posts.Content: Mar 9, 2012 07:53AM - edited Mar 9, 2012 07:53AM by Lauriebelle  I was diagnosed in Nov. 2011 with Stage 4 metastastic breast cancer with mets to my spine. I have just completed the halfway mark with Abraxane and avistan and have 9 more treatments to go.  I had a PET Scan Tuesday and the results today were negative, or no activity.   They still see the 8 mm lesion on my spine T8 vertebrae but it was not active.  Don't know at this point what the future holds for me, but no activity sounds pretty good to  me.
Posts.Title: PET Results CoolBreeze ruthbru
